00001 #include <iostream>
00002 #include <cstdlib>
00003 #include <algorithm>
00004 #include <iterator>
00005 #include <string>
00006 #include <string.h>
00007 #include <sys/types.h>
00008 #include <sys/socket.h>
00009 #include <netinet/in.h>
00010 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00011 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00012 #include "Error.hpp"
00013 #include "Socket.hpp"
00014 
00015 static int send( int sock, int nb )
00016 {
00017    static char buf[16384];
00018    if ( buf[0] == 0 )
00019       memset( buf, 'X', sizeof(buf));
00020       
00021    if ( nb > 16384 ) nb=16384; 
00022    std::cout << "sending: " << nb << "\n";     
00023    return send( sock, buf, nb, 0 );
00024 }
00025 
00026 static int recv( int sock )
00027 {
00028    size_t msg = 0;
00029    SysErrIf( recv( sock, &msg, sizeof(msg), 0 ) == -1 );
00030    msg = ntohl(msg); 
00031    std::cout << "recv: " << msg << "\n";
00032    return msg;
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00043 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00044 {
00045    // echo the command line
00046    std::cout << "testCli started command:\n\t";
00047    std::copy(argv, &argv[argc], std::ostream_iterator<char*>(std::cout, " "));
00048    std::cout << "\n";
00049    
00050    std::string USAGE("Usage: testCli <server ip addr> <server port> [N pings=10]\n");
00051    ErrIf( argc < 3 ).info(USAGE);
00052 
00053    //** Get the server address, port and maxPings arguments
00054    std::string serverIP( argv[1] );
00055    
00056    in_port_t port;
00057    ErrIfCatch(boost::bad_lexical_cast,
00058               port = boost::lexical_cast<in_port_t>( argv[2] ))
00059              .info("%s is not a port number!\n",argv[2]);
00060    
00061    // Put the supplied ip addr into the sockaddr_in struct
00062    sockaddr_in svAddr;
00063    memset( &svAddr, 0, sizeof(svAddr) );
00064    ErrIf( inet_pton(AF_INET, serverIP.c_str(), &svAddr ) != 1 )
00065         .info("Unable to convert '%s' to an AF_INET address\n",serverIP.c_str());
00066    
00067    svAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;     
00068    svAddr.sin_port = htons(port);
00069    
00070    // Get the last (optional) argument which is the number of times to send to the
00071    // server. Default to 10.
00072    int maxPings = 10;
00073    if ( argc > 3 ) {
00074       ErrIfCatch( boost::bad_lexical_cast,
00075                   maxPings=boost::lexical_cast<int>(argv[3]))
00076                .info("Couldn't convert num of pings arg: '%s' to an int\n", argv[3]);
00077    }
00078 
00079 
00080    
00081    //** Connect to the server
00082    Socket sock;
00083    SysErrIf( (sock=socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == -1 );
00084    SysErrIf( connect(sock, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&svAddr), sizeof(svAddr)) == -1 );
00085    
00086    //** Send maxPing messages to the server, each progressively longer then the last
00087    const int MAX_RETRY = 3;
00088    int pingCnt = 0;
00089    while( pingCnt < maxPings ) {
00090       
00091       int snb=0;
00092       int rnb=0;
00093       int resend = 0;
00094       do {
00095          SysErrIf( (snb = send( sock, 1<<pingCnt )) == -1 );
00096          SysErrIf( (rnb = recv( sock )) == -1 );
00097       } while( resend++ < MAX_RETRY && rnb != snb );
00098       ErrIf( resend == MAX_RETRY )
00099          .info("Unable to checksum last packet, %d sent != %d recv\n",snb,rnb);
00100          
00101       ++pingCnt; 
00102    }
00103    
00104    return 0;
00105 }
